metadata.name: File Download Via Windows Defender MpCmpRun.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Windows Defender MpCmdRun.EXE to download files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mpcmdrun.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mpcmdrun.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mpcmdrun.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('microsoft malware protection command line utility') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('downloadfile')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('url')))

output.summary: Detects the use of Windows Defender MpCmdRun.EXE to download files
